
                            
                            <p>8元的月租卡，月销9元的话费。山东济宁地区。 <br> &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; 今天接的0537座机电话，说是送宽带，电话中再三确认，没有低销，没有月租，没有安装费啥的，不用自己花钱，两年后不用了退掉就行。 <br> &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; 回了条信息，就接到了几条充值话费信息，大概800元左右，但是话费余额没有增加。 <br> &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; 截了几张图，帮我看一看又没啥套路。 <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/07/193851yyi0v02240cxfniy.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/07/193851yyi0v02240cxfniy.jpg"> <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/07/193904kmmt444cxxs1dddg.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/07/193904kmmt444cxxs1dddg.jpg"> <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/07/193923al6loqo4lzsmy4sx.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/07/193923al6loqo4lzsmy4sx.jpg"> <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/07/193934iuopqqqqpidgppop.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/07/193934iuopqqqqpidgppop.jpg"> <br>  <br> </p>
